name: Escape from Hell (Zaknarfen)
description:
"You were dragged by death into hell by mistake. Now you need to find your way out."

Escape from Hell is a 2D side-scroller where the map tiles are generated using music. Players will have to react fast as the music get more intense.

The story behind the game is that you were happily slaying monsters, when death tricked you, and brought your soul to hell. Now you have to escape, and get back to your body.
